long_description: Bicycling, June '07 says of these Terry Bella cycling shorts, ''the nonelastic front waist should be standard for shorts: It gives a biblike feel without the hassle.''. You'll love the fit, style and all-day comfort of Terry Bella bike shorts with a chamois that makes you feel like you're riding on air! Features a wide waistband with a low rise that falls below the belly button for comfort when in a aerodynamic position on the bike. Flex-Air chamois features a four-way stretch and multilevel densities, and is completely perforated for unbelievable ventilation. Meryl(TM) microfiber nylon and spandex blend provide excellent moisture management and thermal regulation. Meryl fabric is a bacteriostatic microfiber nylon that allows your skin to maintain a natural bacteria level, so you won't stink when you sweat. Six-panel construction provides support for hard-working muscles. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Silicone grippers hold leg hems in place. Machine washable.
